text:
@Mike_Pence Didn't the Federal Govt jst murder 2 convicts? You can't pick and choose who you're going to kill.
The families of the 140,000 victims of YOUR CoronaVirus Task Force will disagree on your claims of protecting lives.
#PenceFailedAnerica through his MASSIVE incompetence.
Mike, GFY.
